exercises.name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Squats
instructions: Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair.
Keep your back straight and chest up.

exercises.name: Plank
instructions: Start in a push-up position, but rest on your forearms.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Hold the position for as long as possible.
